ygData.subject: Song Selection Advice for a Level 35 Singer
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all, Last night I was in the Assassin/Supplier in Lower Guk for the first time.  Had myself (35 Bard), 44 Paladin, 46 Shaman, 44 Rouge, and 51 Warrior.
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all,

Last night I was in the Assassin/Supplier in Lower Guk for the first time. Had
myself (35 Bard), 44 Paladin, 46 Shaman, 44 Rouge, and 51 Warrior. I was having
trouble selecting which songs to use.

The Shaman was speeding and Primary healer. I was there for Crowd Control (I had
an easy time with and blues and Zols which are low Red but hard time with Wan's
that were Yellow), Manasong, Snaring and ?.

My 3 Song weave was Cantana (34), Snare (23) and Chant of Battle or Damage
Shield. After a while the Shaman got enough mana back after buffing to
slow/speed etc. So I switched to Chant of Battle primarily. During downtime I
did straight mana and depending on our condition would weave Cantana in as well.

What other suggestions for Song Selection do you guys/gals have? I also had
Pixie, Charm, Heal song, Manasong, and Area Fear mem'ed. At level 35 what else
could I have done? I know I could have used Elemental Rhythms (MR/FR/CR) or even
Gaurdian Rhythms (MR). Any other suggestions?

Thanks for any suggestions and help.

-Ranian
